body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Louis White. May I ask who I have the pleasure of speaking with today?

Hi Louis, my name is Michelle Hall.

Nice to meet you, Michelle! How can I assist you today?

Well, I'm a bit concerned about the privacy of my personal information at your school. It's making me a little nervous.

I understand your concern, Michelle. We take privacy very seriously at Harmony Music School. To better assist you, may I confirm the email address we have on file for you?

Sure, it's michelle.hall@domain.com.

Thank you, Michelle. Can I also verify the last four digits of your contact number?

Yes, it's six seven eight nine.

Great, thank you for providing that information. Rest assured, we have strict protocols in place to ensure all personal information is securely stored and accessed only by authorized personnel.

That makes me feel a lot better. Thank you for explaining that, Louis.

You're welcome, Michelle. Thank you for reaching out and trusting us with your concerns. If you have any more questions, feel free to call anytime. Have a great day!
